an4.18:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of making unprejudiced decisions.
an4.18:1.3: Making decisions unprejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice.
an4.18:1.4: These are the four ways of making unprejudiced decisions.
an4.18:2.1: If you don’t act against the teaching
an4.18:2.2: out of favoritism, hostility, cowardice, and stupidity,
an4.18:2.4: like the moon in the waxing fortnight.”
